entry.title: Steal My Phone, Steal My Heart (Daminette)
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,847Chapters: 3/6Kudos: 53

Summary: After 48 sleepless hours in Paris, a disheveled Marinette accidentally grabs the wrong phone—belonging to a rude American tourist. What follows is a chaotic chain of misadventures across the city. But as the day spirals out of control, could this unexpected mix-up be the start of something better?

entry.title: Heirs
entry.summary:
Author: otome_wandering

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 265,056Chapters: 19/76Kudos: 1,597

Summary: Marinette is the Star of the Order of the Miraculous, the still-in-training head, as well as the True Ladybug leading the Court of Miracles. After years at Hawkmoth's mercy, Marinette has decided that enough is enough and is reaching out to Batman, the detective of detectives to help her track down the villian's true identity. What better way to do this than a field trip to Gotham?Damian, the bloodson and heir to both the Cowl and the Demon's Head, wants nothing to do with the French Class who has won the Wayne Enterprises Summer Internship, yet his father insists he needs better interpersonal skills. He supposes it won't kill him to try to work with this supposedly skilled class president if it means that everyone will get off his back for being 'aggressively asocial' (although he will still keep NDAs on standby).A seal of fate, a blood right, and a hidden prophecy lead Marinette and Damian on a rollercoaster of emotions, humourous misunderstandings, comeuppance -- and marriage?!___Basically my attempt at a soulmate AU, full of just about every Damianette cliche and trope I can think of. And some original lore to make it work.Updating MonthlyMaribat Awards 2024 Winner

entry.summary:

entry.title: Defenders of the Universe
entry.summary:
Author: aldanavroon

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,729Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 104

Summary: In a universe where divine forces walk reborn among mortals, balance is everything—and it’s breaking. The ancient Order of Guardians has fallen. Chaos stirs. And four Souls, once meant to appear one at a time, have returned all at once.Creation. Destruction. Lie. Intuition.They’re not ready. They’re not trusted. And one of them looks a little too much like someone Batman once called his son.As legends rise and secrets unravel, the fate of the multiverse may rest on the shoulders of children—ones who carry the weight of gods.

entry.title: The Lies We Tell Ourselves
entry.summary:
Author: Rennielynn

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 633Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 55

Summary: Marinette was sent to live with an old friend of Lois’s when it became obvious that she didn’t have powers like her siblings. Oh how wrong they were. Now living in Paris under the name Marinette Dupain-Cheng, she decides to make the most of it and start over. Only, now she’s the guardian of the Miraculous, is Ladybug (Hero of Paris), and dealing with the fact that her powers don’t work well with magical jewelry. On top of that, Damian Wayne, her twins best friend, transfers into her class. Just great.

entry.title: Time Files When I'm Writing To You
entry.summary:
Author: Jasmineose

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,179Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 86

Summary: One ended with:"You are chaos wrapped in kindness, Marinette Dupain-Cheng. And I, a boy raised in shadows, have only ever wanted to bask in your light."Another replied:"You are a gremlin with a superiority complex. But you are mine. And I think... I love you for that."The story never ended.Because love, like pigeons and crime-fighting teenagers, always finds a way.A way back to each other.A way back with you.

entry.title: Wedded in Shadows: The Ties that Bind
entry.summary:
Author: ToastyRoastyBa

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 51,222Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 517

Summary: My take on a Soulmate/Arranged Marriage AUMarinette Dupain-Cheng and Damian Wayne are bound together by an arranged marriage set in motion when they are just seven years old. This alliance is part of a truce between the Guardians of the Miraculous and the League of Assassins. Though their initial meeting is awkward, they quickly form a close friendship filled with playful banter and innocent dates, gradually falling in love.They suddenly get separated due to an attack from Slade, Only a Ribbon that Damian Keeps tied to his neck, Grounding himself to this Earth, With the hope that Marinette is alive.(They meet each other 2-3 years later dw)

entry.title: Love Letters to a Ghost
entry.summary:
Author: Sunkissedtherain

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,824Chapters: 22/22Kudos: 244

Summary: When Marinette Dupain-Cheng writes fake love letters to get out of a well-meaning matchmaking scheme, she never expects her imaginary boyfriend to show up—especially not as an international heir with secrets of his own. What begins as a PR mess spirals into late-night strategy sessions, Paris tabloids, and a complicated entanglement neither of them saw coming. She wanted distance. He wanted discretion. Now the world is watching.
